definition: start of month/early in the month
New Year's Day in the lunar calendar

sentences.english: May, who took office earlier this month, is the starkest proponent of this.
sentences.chinese: 本月初就职的梅是这种观念最鲜明的倡导者。

sentences.english: And earlier this month, the government executed its top food-and-drug regulator after convicting him on bribery charges.
sentences.chinese: 本月初，政府因受贿罪处决了原国家药检局的局长。

sentences.english: In early July 2010, the lake finally began flowing over the spillway.
sentences.chinese: 2010年7月初，堰塞湖终于通过泄洪渠开始放水。

sentences.english: Early September data suggests a similar negative trend.
sentences.chinese: 九月初数据也显示了同样的负面趋势。

sentences.english: Today is September ninth by lunar calendar. It's the Double Ninth Festival.
sentences.chinese: 今天是农历九月初九，是重阳节。

sentences.english: The boys from the island of Tokelau disappeared in a small boat in early October.
sentences.chinese: 在10月初，三名托克劳岛的小男孩在小船上消失了。

sentences.english: First of all, may I extend my new year  greetings to all of you, because according to Chinese lunar calendar, today is the 10th day of the first month of the Year of the Tiger.
sentences.chinese: 今天是中国农历虎年正月初十，我先给大家拜个晚年。

sentences.english: This will be followed up by CR2 release in the beginning of August.
This month may well seem like a dream. Things will start happening the moment the month takes off.
sentences.chinese: 这个月对你来说就像一个梦，好事情在月初就会到来。

sentences.english: But earlier this month there was a big announcement.
sentences.chinese: 但这个月月初，一个重大的协议发表了。

sentences.english: Shortly after the New Year, Mr. Schwartz stopped by Mr. Cayne's office.
sentences.chinese: 1月初的一天，施瓦茨来到凯恩的办公室。

sentences.english: By early March it is time to move the bees.
sentences.chinese: 三月初是迁移蜜蜂的时候。

sentences.english: The 9th day of September in the lunar calendar is "the Chinese Chong Yang Festival" and a happy occasion in autumn.
sentences.chinese: 农历九月初九是“中国的重阳节”和秋天快乐的时光。

sentences.english: Ban said earlier this month that he wanted a second term.
sentences.chinese: 在本月初，潘基文表示连任意愿。

sentences.english: And Japanese former(foreign) minister Taro Aso said mister Abe may visit China as early as October.
sentences.chinese: 日本外相麻生太郎称安倍会在十月初访问中国。

sentences.english: It was very early in September;
sentences.chinese: 现在是九月初，正赶上好时节。

definition: end of month/late in the month
